title: Modele IT
text:
Breusch-Godfrey Test for the autocorrelation in residuals:

    Breusch-Godfrey test for serial correlation of order up to 1

data:  modelFull$model
LM test = 0.33638, df1 = 1, df2 = 5, p-value = 0.5871

------------------------------------------------------ 

 Ljung-Box Test for the autocorrelation in residuals:

    Box-Ljung test

data:  res
X-squared = 1.1158, df = 1, p-value = 0.2908

------------------------------------------------------ 

 Breusch-Pagan Test for the homoskedasticity of residuals:

    studentized Breusch-Pagan test

data:  modelFull$model
BP = 18.67, df = 21, p-value = 0.6063

------------------------------------------------------ 

 Shapiro-Wilk test of normality of residuals:

    Shapiro-Wilk normality test

data:  modelFull$model$residual
W = 0.97682, p-value = 0.7196

------------------------------------------------------ 

 PESARAN, SHIN AND SMITH (2001) COINTEGRATION TEST 

 Observations: 34 
 Number of Regressors (k): 4 
 Case: 4 

 ------------------------------------------------------ 
 -                       F-test                       - 
 ------------------------------------------------------ 
                 <------- I(0) ------------ I(1) -----> 
 10% critical value       3.035            3.997 
 5% critical value        3.578            4.668 
 1% critical value        5.147            6.617 
 

 F-statistic = 5.66356609457359 
  
 ------------------------------------------------------ 
 
 
------------------------------------------------------ 

 Ramsey's RESET Test for model specification:

    RESET test

data:  modelECM$model
RESET = 1.8727, df1 = 2, df2 = 12, p-value = 0.196

------------------------------------------------------
